name: Bleat The Wolf
description:
Bleat The Wolf is a political simulator set in a meadow, where a sinister wolf is drawing the herd's attention with its political ideas.

As guard llama, you must stand against the wolf by suggesting your own policies. Sheep are fickle and easily swayed: be mindful of how press headlines affect public opinion. Will you stick to your ideals, or compromise to save the flock?
